trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""></xref> base class from which <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord"></xref>, <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord"></xref> are derived.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""> </xref> classe a partir da qual base <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord"> </xref>, e <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord"> </xref> derivadas.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] During its execution, a workflow instance emits three kinds of tracking events to the runtime tracking infrastructure: activity status events, user events, and workflow status events.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Durante a execução uma instância de fluxo de trabalho emite três tipos de eventos de controlo para a infraestrutura de controlo de runtime: eventos de estado de atividade, eventos de utilizador e os eventos de estado do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure tries to match these events with track points in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: A infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução tenta corresponder estes eventos com pontos de controlar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: Whenever the runtime tracking infrastructure matches a track point, it sends a tracking record that contains data associated with both the track point and the tracking event to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Sempre que a infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução corresponde a um ponto de registo, envia um registo de controlo que contém os dados associados ao ponto de registo e o evento de controlo para o serviço de controlo.

trans-unit.source: There are three kinds of tracking record that the runtime tracking infrastructure can send: an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>, and a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: Existem três tipos de registo de controlo que pode enviar a infraestrutura de controlo de runtime: um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>, um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>e um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: Each kind of tracking record derives from the TrackingRecord class and corresponds to one of the three kinds of track point that the runtime tracking infrastructure can match: an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>, or a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>.
trans-unit.target: Cada tipo de registo de controlo deriva da classe de TrackingRecord e corresponde a um dos três tipos de ponto de registo que pode corresponder a infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução: um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>, um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>, ou um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada numa classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the collection of annotations associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém a coleção de anotações associados com o ponto de registo.

trans-unit.source: You can specify annotations to be associated with an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> or a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: Pode especificar anotações estar associado um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>ou um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure stores these annotations, and, when it matches the track point, it returns them in Annotations.
trans-unit.target: A infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução armazena estes anotações, e, quando corresponder o ponto de registo, devolve-os em anotações.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection"></xref> that contains the annotations associated with the track point to which this <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord"></xref> corresponds.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection"> </xref> que contém as anotações associadas com o ponto de registo para o qual este <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord"> </xref> corresponde.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the event data, if any, that is associated with the tracking event that caused the tracking record to be sent.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém ou define os dados do evento, se existir, que estão associados com o evento de controlo que provocou o registo de controlo para serem enviados.

trans-unit.source: Certain kinds of tracking events emitted by a workflow instance have event data associated with them.
trans-unit.target: Determinados tipos de controlo emitidos por uma instância de fluxo de trabalho de eventos tem dados de eventos associados aos mesmos.

trans-unit.source: If a tracking event has event data associated with it, the runtime tracking infrastructure puts the event data in EventArgs property of the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Se um evento de controlo tiver dados do evento associados ao mesmo, a infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução coloca os dados do evento EventArgs propriedade da classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: For example, when a workflow instance is terminated, the runtime tracking infrastructure sends a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> set to a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> that contains information about the reason for the termination.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando uma instância de fluxo de trabalho foi terminada, o tempo de execução controlo infraestrutura envia um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>com <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>definido como um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>que contém informações sobre o motivo para a terminação.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that represents the event data, if any, that is associated with the tracking event that caused the tracking record to be sent.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que representa os dados do evento, se existir, que estão associados com o evento de controlo que provocou o registo de controlo para serem enviados.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the time and date of the tracking event associated with the tracking record.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém ou define a hora e data do evento de rastreio associado com o registo de controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> is Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DateTime>é de hora Universal Coordenada (UTC).</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that indicates the date and time that the tracking event occurred.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>que indica a data e hora em que ocorreu o evento de controlo.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that indicates the order of the tracking event associated with the tracking record relative to the other tracking events emitted by the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, obtém ou define um valor que indica a ordem do evento de rastreio associado com o registo de rastreio relativos os eventos de controlo emitidos pela instância do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: EventOrder indicates the relative order of the tracking event within the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: EventOrder indica a ordem relativa do controlo de evento dentro de instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: EventOrder will be unique within a workflow instance, but it is not guaranteed to be sequential.
trans-unit.target: EventOrder será exclusivo dentro de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho, mas não é garantido ser sequenciais.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the order of the tracking event relative to the other tracking events emitted by the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica a ordem do evento de rastreio relativos os eventos de controlo emitidos pela instância do fluxo de trabalho.
